```{r}
fm_s212_aids <- gls(CD4 ~ obstime + obstime:drug, data = aids,
                    correlation = corSymm(form = ~ 1 | patient),
                    weights = varIdent(form = ~ 1 | obstime))

plot(fm_s212_aids, resid(., type = "p") ~ fitted(.), 
     type = c("p", "smooth"), lwd = 3)
```
